pages.text: $(li)The interior of the $(l)Void Worm Eye$() emits a very powerful and corrupt magic.$(br)$(li)This Orb can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/dimensional_carver)Dimensional Carver$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It only can be obtained defeating the $(l:patchouli:bosses/void_worm)Void Worm$(/l).
